content.raw:
Now that pull request #51 has been merged, it should be mostly okay to merge this one into default.

However, much of our CI is expecting the `default` branch to provide `ign-cmake0`, but this pull request will change that to `ign-cmake1`.

I think before merging this branch, it will be crucial to update all of our CI to use the `ign-cmake0` branch instead of `default`.
content.html:
Now that pull request #51 has been merged, it should be mostly okay to merge this one into default.

However, much of our CI is expecting the default branch to provide ign-cmake0, but this pull request will change that to ign-cmake1.

I think before merging this branch, it will be crucial to update all of our CI to use the ign-cmake0 branch instead of default.
